system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}

Benefit

When firing an anti-materiel, bolt action, designated marksman rifle, or sniper rifle, the Combat Point cost is 1 less and the character receives a +1 to all attacks. Also, when firing an anti-materiel, bolt action, designated marksman rifle, or sniper rifle while using a magnified optic of 1.5x or greater, a character does not receive a -4 penalty for their attack roll within the first range increment.

Normal

Attacks within the first range increment with any magnified optic of 1.5x or greater grants a -4 penalty on the attack roll.
